en.at_info_text:
â„¹ï¸ Auto-trade â€” Instruction

ğŸ¤– What is Auto-trade
Auto-trade is automated trading based on signals.
When enabled, the bot opens trades on the exchange using your API keys.

ğŸª™ SPOT (no leverage)
â€¢ Regular buy/sell of an asset.
â€¢ Lower risk compared to futures.

âš¡ï¸ FUTURES (with leverage)
â€¢ LONG / SHORT with leverage (x2â€¦x20, etc.).

âš™ï¸ How the bot opens trades
1) You enable SPOT and/or FUTURES
2) You connect exchange API keys
3) You set amount/margin, leverage and Cap
4) Bot receives a signal â†’ opens a trade (if Auto-trade is enabled)
5) Trade is closed by bot logic (TP / SL / signal / rules)

ğŸ”‘ How to connect API keys
1) Open: âš™ï¸ Settings â†’ ğŸ”‘ API keys
2) Choose exchange (Binance / Bybit) and market (SPOT / FUTURES)
3) Paste API Key and API Secret
4) Tap â€œVerify / Saveâ€

ğŸ“Œ Where to create API keys
â€¢ Binance: Profile â†’ API Management â†’ Create API
â€¢ Bybit: Account & Security â†’ API Management â†’ Create New Key

âœ… Required permissions
â€¢ Read â€” balances and positions
â€¢ Trade â€” place orders
âŒ Withdraw â€” DO NOT enable!

ğŸ›¡ Security (very important)
â€¢ Never share your API Key / Secret
â€¢ Enable IP Restriction (server IP) if possible
â€¢ If a key is compromised â€” delete it immediately on the exchange

âš ï¸ Important
â€¢ Cap limits maximum spending / margin â€” must be used.

en.at_faq_text:
â“ Why was no trade opened?
Possible reasons:
â€¢ âŒ Auto-trade is disabled (SPOT / FUTURES)
â€¢ âŒ API keys are not connected
â€¢ âŒ Insufficient balance
â€¢ âŒ Cap limit reached
â€¢ âŒ Exchange or market temporarily unavailable
â€¢ âŒ Trading pair is not supported

ğŸ‘‰ What to do:
â€¢ Make sure SPOT / FUTURES are enabled
â€¢ Check API key status
â€¢ Ensure you have enough balance
â€¢ Increase Cap or wait for trades to close

â“ Why was the trade closed immediately?
â€¢ Stop Loss was triggered
â€¢ Sharp price movement
â€¢ Bot risk-management rules applied

â“ Why do I see a loss?
â€¢ Market moved against the position
â€¢ On FUTURES, losses increase due to leverage
â€¢ Trading fees and funding are included

â“ What if I get an API error?
â€¢ Check API Key / Secret
â€¢ Make sure Read + Trade permissions are enabled
â€¢ Ensure the key still exists on the exchange
â€¢ Try re-saving the API keys

â“ Can I lose my entire balance?
â€¢ SPOT â€” only the invested amount
â€¢ FUTURES â€” only margin + fees
â€¢ Cap limits maximum risk (always recommended)

â“ How to stop auto-trading?
â€¢ Disable SPOT and/or FUTURES in âš™ï¸ Settings
